subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description:
# Ethnic minority leaders at provincial, county and township level exposed to the training of modern planning and human development methodologies for poverty reduction in ethnic minority areas
# The concept of community driven development understood among all the stakeholders and applied to help small ethnic minority communities identify and promote their livelihood improvement 
# Models of pro-poor tourism and local ethnic handicraft development piloted with a strong participation of ethnic minority community
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Minority Poverty Alleviation
